about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am passionate about technology and cybersecurity, currently working at Altia as a cybersecurity consultant and offensive pentester, applying my knowledge in real-world security projects.
about.p2: I consider myself analytical, proactive, and highly self-motivated, especially enjoying the development of offensive skills, such as identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities, as well as conducting penetration tests.
about.p3: I am continuously learning, exploring new tools and intrusion techniques, with the goal of becoming a highly skilled offensive security professional and adding value in high-security environments.

master.title: Master's in Cybersecurity and Privacy
master.description: Master's graduate in Cybersecurity and Privacy, with experience in system protection, forensic analysis, and ethical hacking. Proficient in key tools such as NMap, Burp Suite, Metasploit, and Wireshark. My next goal is to obtain the CEH and OSCP certifications.

degree.title: Bachelor's in Computer Engineering
degree.description: Graduated in Computer Engineering with a strong background in programming (Java, C, C++, Python, SQL, PHP), data analysis (Pentaho, Apache Superset), and web development (Angular, HTML, CSS, JavaScript). Experience in system administration (Linux, Bash scripting) and network configuration.
